conclusion: The magnetic field is perpendicular to the plane and pointing inward, causing circular motion.
Clarification of the particle's initial velocity direction in the fourth quadrant.
The particle's initial direction is 45 degrees clockwise from the negative y-axis.
The path from O to P is a straight line at a 45-degree angle upwards from the x-axis.
The particle moves from O to some point in the fourth quadrant under the influence of the magnetic field.
